content: warm up to a classic christmas with this super-easy striped crochet blanket made using red heart super saver you ll work up row of granny stitch in holiday-colored stripes to bring a touch of tradition to this fun time of year practice double_crochet chain granny stitch in row color changes and reverse single_crochet techniques add a personal touch by using your own color choices materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a cherry red 0319 1 ball or 340 yds/310 m contrast b spring green 0672 3 balls or 922 yds/843 m contrast c paddy green 0368 1 ball or 340 yds/310 m contrast d soft white 0316 2 balls or 429 yds/392 m measurements approx 45 114 5 cm wide x 59 150 cm long
